summary:
The code defines a module for handling wave audio files. It imports necessary modules and defines constants for PCM and extensible wave formats. It also defines a named tuple _wave_params for storing wave file parameters. The __init__ method initializes a wave file object with a file object, alignment, endianness, and whether to include the header. It reads the chunk name and size from the file, and sets the file offset and seekable status. The code also includes a class definition for Wave_read and other functions.

该代码实现了一个用于处理波形音频文件的模块。它导入了必要的模块，并定义了PCM和可扩展波形格式的常量。它还定义了一个名为_wave_params的命名元组，用于存储波形文件的参数。__init__方法初始化了一个波形文件对象，接受文件对象、对齐方式、字节序以及是否包含头部信息等参数。它从文件中读取块名称和大小，并设置文件偏移量和可寻址状态。代码还包括Wave_read类的定义以及其他函数。
